doc.field: Centennial Celebration of the Evacuation of the City of New-York by the British collection
Centennial Celebration of the Evacuation of the City of New-York by the British collection

This collection contains programs, newspapers and periodicals, posters, and souvenirs relating to the Centennial Celebration of the Evacuation of the City of New-York by the British in 1883, and minutes of the celebration's organizing committee.

This collection contains programs, newspapers and periodicals, posters, and souvenirs relating to the Centennial Celebration of the Evacuation of the City of New-York by the British in 1883, and minutes of the celebration's organizing committee.

Joint Committee on the Centennial Celebration of the Evacuation of New York by the British

This collection contains programs, newspapers and periodicals, posters, and souvenirs relating to the Centennial Celebration of the Evacuation of the City of New-York by the British in 1883, and minutes of the celebration's organizing committee.

The Centennial Celebration of the Evacuation of the City of New-York by the British was held in 1883 to commemorate the evacuation of British forces from New York after their defeat by the Continental Army in the Revolutionary War.
Gift of John Austin Stevens, date unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
